main event: On October 6, 1968, an unidentified flying object was detected on radar at Minot Air Force Base, North Dakota.
interesting points: The radar operator tracked the object for approximately 30 minutes before it faded from the screen,The object was estimated to be moving at a speed between 3,000-5,000 mph and changing direction abruptly,Attempts were made by aircraft from Minot AFB to visually acquire the object after it was observed on radar,Weather conditions were clear and good visibility at the time of the sighting,The object was reported as circular in shape and approximately 40-50 feet in diameter.
sighted object: unidentified flying object displayed on radar
witness description: TSGT Robert B. Wood and MSGT William R. Waring performing routine security checks
